name: angular-speed-dial
description: FAB Speed Dial component for Angular Material

scripts.build: rm -rf dist 2> /dev/null ; npx ngc -p tsconfig.es5.json ; mv dist/smd-fab-speed-dial.js dist/smd-fab-speed-dial.es5.js ; mv dist/smd-fab-speed-dial.js.map dist/smd-fab-speed-dial.es5.js.map ; rm dist/smd-fab-speed-dial.d.ts dist/smd-fab-speed-dial.metadata.json ; npx ngc -p . ; chmod -R 777 dist ; git add dist
